LanguageData.debug_mode_desc: Print debug information to log file/console.
LanguageData.distance_consciousness_bonus_desc:
When bonded pawns are in different maps they suffer a debuff to their consciousness.

Can be set between -100 to 100.

Positive numbers will buff consciousness.

Negative numbers will debuff consciousness.

Default -25%.
LanguageData.consciousness_bonus_desc:
When bonded pawns are close to each other their consciousness get buffed.

Can be set between 0 to 100.

Default 15%.
LanguageData.bond_torn_mood_effect_desc:
When the bond is torn the pawn will suffer decreased mood for 30 days.

Can be set between -100 to 100.

Positive numbers will buff mood.

Negative numbers will debuff mood.

Default -25.
